mapper.select: SELECT cr.* FROM chat_rooms cr JOIN chat_participants cp ON cr.room_id = cp.room_id WHERE cp.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT room_name AS roomName, room_size AS roomSize FROM chat_rooms WHERE room_id = #{roomId}

SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.nickname, u.profile_image_url AS profileImageUrl, crm.last_read_at AS lastReadAt FROM chat_room_members crm JOIN users u ON crm.user_id = u.user_id WHERE crm.room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY u.nickname
SELECT room_id AS roomId, room_type AS roomType, room_name AS roomName, room_size AS roomSize, created_at AS createdAt FROM chat_rooms WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_rooms (room_type, room_name, room_size) VALUES (#{roomType}, #{roomName}, #{roomSize})
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_rooms SET room_name = #{roomName} WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
UPDATE chat_room_members SET last_read_at = #{lastReadAt} WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND room_id = #{roomId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM chat_room_members WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND user_id = #{userId}
